    About

    Who am I?

    I am currently employed as a PostDoc by the university of Ghent working at TEREC and ForNaLab within the TREEWEB project.

    Before that I did my PhD at the Technical University of Munich with the terestrial ecology group and working on how plant diversity affect arthropod communities and the ecosystem functions that they perform. This was done within the framework of the Jena experiment, you can read my PhD thesis from the mediaTUM website.
